name: Eruption
description: You are a volcano! Assert your dominance as a force of nature and show puny islanders who's boss! Harness the power of lava, giant rocks, earthquakes, and lightning to cause as much destruction as you can. Do you have what it takes to be a legendary volcano?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics cards may not be enough, but any dedicated GPU should be enough. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: A mouse with a left and right click, scroll wheel, and middle mouse click is required for play.
